sourcesContent:
// DirectIPNotAllowed.js import React from 'react'; import './DirectIPNotAllowed.css'; function DirectIPNotAllowed() { const currentTime = new Date().toLocaleString(); return (

Error 1003 Direct IP access not allowed

What happened?

You've requested an IP address directly. Direct IP access to this website is not permitted for security reasons.

What can I do?

To access this website, please use the correct domain name in your web browser.

Current Time: {currentTime}

Performance & security by rachakondadharmendra.info

); } export default DirectIPNotAllowed;
